phrases: If you are not paying attention, be prepared for a poking attack from my fingers
I am little, but I will squish you; you are as tiny as a flea to me
What I want is a plastic heart (plus, plus, but it is a minus)
But that is boring; when I would notice it, I would have won against you
Love is something that is bittersweet
Simple and clear yet complex and strange stuff
I am only worrying about things that do not matter
You are gentle and sincere yet eccentric
I pretend to be strong all over and compete against you
Just by being honest, it is so stimulating and I feel dizzy
I get hurt, I hurt you, in a preparation of pure feelings
In my head, there is always a pre-parade of pure feelings all by myself
Then let us put salt on
Because I want you to know more about me
More than anyone else, I want to bare my self
But I cannot do it, I have got nothing for experience
But a love that is just sweet
Is slightly different from what I am seeking
If I am told it is white
I would say it is black
I say one thing but do another
If I am told, I love you
I would say, I hate you
I am happy, but what am I saying?
Oohashi High School Culture Festival (Part One)
In the end, we could not sleep, huh...
What are we going to do about today's Scare Minorin, Enter the White Knight plan?
Will we be able to scare Kushieda while we are scared as well?
If we do not do it, the future will not change!
Something Minorin will be scared of...
What do you mean by something Minorin will be scared of?
What kind of foul plans are you plotting so early in the morning?
So that is how it is, huh?
Do not you feel sorry for Kushieda?
M-Minorin is extremely fond of horror.
She said she loves being surprised and getting scared,
so I wanted to make some summer memories -
So that is why instead of her being scared,
her eyes were glowing with avarice.
Why do not we work together,
She is bound to be familiar with the area.
We will strike while the iron is hot!
No, but Kawashima will not do it!
I will definitely talk her into it!
There is nothing we can do.
I was planning to make breakfast, but I was beaten to it.
Everyone said they are going to be playing at the sea for the whole day today, you see.
You got up early for that?!
Chef, this unworthy Kushieda will be of assistance too!
Now, order me as you please!
Then, can you slice up the onions?
Yes, wholeheartedly glad to do so!
Also, soup from the leftovers of the curry, I guess.
You are good at that, Kushieda.
Your cleaning yesterday was good too.
Both my parents work, you see.
When my little brother was at home, I had to make lunch boxes too.
He is an active high school baseball player, Akechi-kun.
Ah, it got in my eye!
Ah, got to peel the apples!
Yesterday's curry was the best too.
It was not that big of a thing, though...
I think that diligent side of you is really wonderful.
The rest of the class does not know this side of you.
Whoever becomes Takasu-kun's bride will be really happy.
I have not talked about that with anyone else.
I said more than I should have.
But I am glad it was with Takasu-kun.
But Chef, what shall we do next?
Shall we mix it with real force?!
Then, we will do it according to plan.
With Ami's guidance, we set up traps in a nearby cave.
Then, we will get nowhere without her help.
It is heavy for a girl, right?
Takasu-kun, do you want to look too?
It is fine, is not it?
Ah, you already saw me in a bikini at school, right?
But this part comes off, you know.
Then, you put it back on.
If you are going to be like that, I am not going to help out.
Why does Takasu-kun want Minori-chan to enjoy herself?
If you are not going to tell me, I am not helping out.
You have got five seconds, okay?
If you are not with us, we will not be able to get around in the caves, right?
Did not I draw you a map?
I am sorry, Yuusaku, but you will have to do it on your own.
Takasu-kun was the one who chose, after all.
Going alone will be difficult, right?
If the two of us leave by ourselves, it might look rather suspicious.
I have come up with three praiseworthy ideas for traps.
Kushieda will definitely go half-crazy from fear!
I am going to the toilet!
Takasu-kun sure is a cooking prodigy!
No, Kushieda helped me out, after all...
That egg sandwich was mixed with force by yours truly!
Lunch while I am not around?
Announcing to girls with a loud voice that you are going to the toilet...!
And besides, you were gone for so long.
Towards the cove there is a really pretty cave, you see.
Want to take a stroll over there later?
Okay, let us try going in, then!
B-But, does not it feel like something will come out?
Like an encounter with an unidentified creature?!
No, if it was a living thing, it would be fine...
Yeah, let us make sure to capture it alive!
Making him our accomplice was really the right thing to do.
We are going to find the two-headed golden cobra!
I feel like I have heard that before.
We did not come here for a simple test of courage.
From here on, it goes down a level, so be careful.
Hey, is not it getting cold?
It is because we have come further in.
No, I did not mean that...
Yeah, he is an idiot all right.
It is the curse of a broken-hearted woman who lost her way inside this cave...
You set up some traps too, huh?
My final trap is fifty meters up ahead.
It is not part of the setup.
It is the same as last night...
It is dangerous alone, so let us hold hands!
Let us tie up real good!
I am all warmed up now, so let us go on ahead!
I am going to use a shortcut to go back before everyone else.
Are we going even further in?
Do you really know the way?!
Are you that uneasy about being separated from the rest?
I am not really good with...
what would you do if I left you behind?
Would you be uneasy about being separated from me?
Would you think that you do not want to be separated from me?
This is not the time for that.
Do you want to return to Minori as fast as possible?
I do not think that girl suits Takasu-kun.
Wha - I-It is not like I...
The one who is suitable for Takasu-kun is...
I would not kid about something like this!
I am sure Kitamura and the others will come looking for us!
You do not need to apologise!
What I said about being lost...
Like I would ever get lost!
This is not the time to be laughing!
But Takasu-kun was acting just like a kid!
I was really scared, you know!
Earlier I said Minori-chan was not suited for Takasu-kun, right?
I think you would simply get burned away.
I mean, Takasu-kun would not hit Minori-chan, right?
You cannot be equal simply with admiration.
The one you could be equal with would be...
What do you mean by something?
Do not tell me that, Kushieda was...!
Since it is come to this,
I am going to beat it to pieces!
and the scattered clothes in Taiga's room...
All of them were our doing!
Well, the way you were trying to scare me was so amateurish, you see.
So I ended up wanting to teach you how.
Showing you that this is how you scare people.
Yeah, since you two were lurking around like that by yourselves.
And that is why I made Kitamura-kun my accomplice,
You are not going to get mad?
After all, I really love horror!
You could call it the Manjuu Kowai method.
If I say I am scared of ghosts and I am scared of the occult,
someone is bound to try to scare me.
And I would gladly receive it!
And now that we are done telling you about the prank...
Today really was one hell of a day.
I did not really give you an answer.
I would be lonely without you around.
However, rather than whether I would be lonely,
should not it be about whether you would be lonely?
I have never really considered whether I am lonely or not.
Is not that a bit painful?
If it gets painful, just genuinely express that emotion.
I was completely fooled and utterly frightened,
but when I am with you, it is fun.
And the curry was also really good.
And you listened to my strange little tale without laughing at it.
I am really sorry for scaring you.
I really wanted to show Takasu-kun ghosts,
and ended up kind of overdoing it.
Because you said you wanted to see ghosts.
Why did Takasu-kun want to scare me?
Taiga told me that you were scared of horror.
So you wanted to tease me?
Takasu-kun would never do something to someone that they would dislike.
You are the type who is always considering how to make someone happy.
Why did that Takasu-kun do something like this, I wonder.
I really want to know that.
I think it is really strange.
I wanted to show you one.
I wanted to make you believe that ghosts exist.
I think it is too early to give up just because you cannot see them.
Takasu-kun, shall we go and find a UFO next?
One that is not a man-made satellite.
And then, if we keep finding the things I want to see,
and if my world has been changed...
A sudden outbreak of a galactic war, huh?!
The Earth will be protected by us!
The trip continues until you are home, you know!
Everyone, do not let your guard down!
Maybe I should go home to my parent's house after this.
Shall we stop by the supermarket and buy some stuff?
I am tired, so do not talk to me about shitty housewife's tasks.
Look, there is a special sale today.
chests throbbing from a cosplay cafe,
heating up one's friendship around a camp fire,
and an embarrassing leg-lock at a pro-wrestling show!
